title: WTB - T206 EPDG John Hummel - offering $1,300 and up for card with numerical grade
author: HobokenJon

posts.post_title: WTB - T206 EPDG John Hummel - offering $1,300 and up for card with numerical grade
posts.post_content:
Bumping my previous minimum offer by $100. 

WTB — T206 EPDG John Hummel, paying $1,300 and up for a copy in a PSA or SGC holder with a numerical grade. Will also consider raw copies or slabbed cards graded "authentic." p/p f/f
